name: Educational Content Creator Simulator
description:
ECCS is a game where you play a content creator, trying to reach a certain number of members and revenue within 30 days. Watch out though, with popularity comes a price..

Some content was scrapped in order to meet the deadline of Christmas, this is what was scrapped. This may be added in one or more future updates, but no promises:
- Topics have a skill value, the more skill you have in a topic, the better your audience's reception
- The need to act differently if the light is threatened to be dismantled
- You get suggestions from commenters to know how to improve your content
- Partnerships
- Livestream & community post content types
- God knows what else

3D assets, music and programming by me, textures from Sketchup Texture Club. Thank you Jerkakame for providing both your face and voice acting!

This game was made for Artemiy for the Secret Santa Game Jam, Merry Christmas buddy!
